title: VMware vRealize Orchestrator Appliance 6.0.2-[FirstUploads]
description:
VMware vRealize Orchestrator Appliance 6.0.2-[FirstUploads]


VMwareÃ‚Â® vCenterÃ¢â€žÂ¢ OrchestratorÃ¢â€žÂ¢ simplifies the automation of complex IT tasks and integrates with VMwareÃ‚Â® vCloud SuiteÃ‚Â® components, to adapt and extend service delivery and operational management, thereby effectively working with existing infrastructure, tools and processes.

What vCenter Orchestrator Does

Simple yet Robust Workflow Automation
Rapidly design and deploy scalable workflows that automate complex IT processes.

Accelerate Process Automation
Leverage vCO workflows and plug-ins to extend the capabilities of VMware vCloud Suite and the vSphere platform. The cloud management marketplace on VMware Solution Exchange provides a library of VMware and partner-provided vCO workflows and plug-ins.

Powerful Management Features
Create your own types to use in workflows, without having to wait for a plug-in update or creating a new plug-in. Generic plug-ins allow you to automatically create workflows based on SOAP, REST operations and PowerShell scripts.

Open, Flexible Architecture
Automate management and operational tasks across both VMware and third-party applications, such as service desks, change management and IT asset management systems.

Adapt and Extend VCloud Automation CenterÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Service Delivery Capabilities
Automate the delivery of new IT services or adapt the capabilities of existing VCloud Automation Center infrastructure and application services by invoking VCO workflows and plug-ins.

Automate vCenter Operations Corrective Actions
Use vCO workflows to automatically resolve operational issues, that vCenter Operations identifies, by using the vCenter Operations remediation workflow package
